about_the_game:
CryoFall - Supporter Pack

About this Pack


This is a collection of bonus goodies for all those who wish to go the extra mile to support the developers of CryoFall. Listen to the game’s atmospheric soundtrack while browsing through concept and game art. As a sign of appreciation, the game will display a special supporter's badge in the game chat.


Contents

  • The complete CryoFall soundtrack
  • Supporter exclusive weapon and equipment skins
  • In-game supporter badge
  • Concept art
  • High resolution game art
  • Character animations in GIF format
  • Game avatars
  • Miscellaneous goodie collection (game icons, boxart etc.)


Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for your support and for helping to shape CryoFall!
